title: Chat restriction is broken
body:
I don't mind the chat restriction. That is not the issue. I havent logged on in 6months. I didn't even remember having the restriction but after playing 2 games it still says 25 game restriction. Isn't that number supposed to go down each game so eventually it comes off? I don't know how much has changed since I played. Maybe its a permanent chat restriction. If so, could you please stop the pop up appearing every time I log in? If it is not permanent then maybe there is a bug there for you to have a look at as to why the amount of games needed to play to lower the restriction is not going down.

Thought it needed mentioning to you :) if you know about this issue/bug then forget I said anything :)

Thank you all
See you around the games

replies.body: I just got a new notification in the notification bar saying 15 more games. So hope it is fixed now. Hope I helped in some way :) thank you
Most likely it just wasn't updating the games for the notification, it shouldn't have any actual effect on how many games you have to play (cause it's just a display bug) even if it does it again :)
